Package peersim.kademlia.operations

Class PutOperation

java.lang.Object
peersim.kademlia.operations.Operation
peersim.kademlia.operations.FindOperation
peersim.kademlia.operations.GetOperation
peersim.kademlia.operations.PutOperation
public class PutOperation extends GetOperation
This class represents a find operation and offer the methods needed to maintain and update the closest set. It also maintains the number of parallel requsts that can has a maximum of ALPHA.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Daniele Furlan, Maurizio Bonani
